item.description:
Just as the academic year begins, it's a great time to get together and catch up. We're meeting up for drinks and apps at Orleans after work on Wednesday, September 1st, and for those of you interested, we're playing trivia at 8 PM. There are teams of 5, so we will have to split up into a couple of teams.

Some of us will arrive between 6 and 6:30 PM since we have the faculty meeting and reception to attend, so make room for us!

Feel free to forward this email to anyone I may have forgotten.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Tufts Meet-up Sign and little jumbo.
item.name: Happy Hour & Trivia
